document_data.mainbody:
argus Freely was an inhabitant of the city of Baldurs Gate who died some years before the late 15 century DR.
Bargus Freely perished sometime before the  and was buried in the Lower City Graveyard, near the cemetery arched gate and the Durinbold Mausoleum. The gravestone was etched with a single inscription "Here lies Bargus Freely. He shouldve lookt before he leapt," suggesting the mans cause of death.
